rule: The response should contain more than the tag corresponding to the part of speech of the given word with additional text.
input: sentence: I will run., word: run
validityText:
The sentence "I will run." is a valid English sentence as it is a continuous string of characters including alphabets, spaces, and allowed punctuation. The word "run" is a valid English word and is present in the given sentence. The word "run" is also a single continuous string of characters without spaces.

OK
